description: Maps the behavior labels to the corresponding coachable item type (based on https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/master/go/src/samsaradev.io/safety/behaviorlabel/coachableitems.go)

schema.name: behavior_label
schema.description: The numerical value for a behavior label

schema.name: coachable_item_id
schema.description: The ID of the coachable item type
